TextView.android:text: Request for Review of Disbursement Vouchers and Supporting Documents with Bidding (Goods)
This service checks for the completeness, propriety and mathematical accuracy of the documents.
All employees of the Municipal Government of Kitaotao
1 Original and 3 Photocopies of the following documents
11. Official Receipt / Sales Invoice / Delivery Receipt / Charge Invoice
21. Business Permit / Tax Clearance Certificate / BIR Certificate of Registration / Financial Statements / SEC Registration
Additional Requirement for Purchase of Construction/Repair materials of Infrastructure projects undertaken by the administration
Additional Requirement for meals and snacks
Additional Requirement for purchase of medicines
• Valid Certificate of Registration (CPR) issued by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
• Batch notification, Lot Release Certification from FDA or its equivalent, as required by FDA for specific drugs and medicines
• Valid License to Operate (LTO) issued by the FDA for Suppliers, Distributors and Traders
• Certificate of Accreditation from Department of Health (DOH)
• Authority to Distribute duly sworn from DOH
• Certificate that the medicines purchased are listed in the PNDF
1. Submit Disbursement Voucher with complete supporting documents to the Accounting Office
1.1. Evaluate the completeness, check for mathematical accuracy, and control the voucher as to the availability of funds
Administrative Aide II\n Municipal Accounting Office

Administrative Aide II
Municipal Accounting Office

MAA-II
Municipal Accounting Office
1.3. Review and sign the disbursement voucher
1.4. Submit approved voucher and documents to Treasurer’s Office for check issuance
2. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) Form and drop in the CSS drop box
2.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) form
